Title: The Reckoning
Plot: Xena is mistaken for the killer who attacked and murdered a gropu of townspeople and is put on trial, causing Ares, the god of war to be delighted at the success of his plan.
GuestStars: Bill Johnson, Christopher Mayer, Danny Lineham, Christian Hodge, Phaedra Hurst, Meryl Main, Sam Holland, Ross Harper
